name: Things that go on the body
name_original: Things that go on the body
description:
Click or tap on the game to activate it. 

If you’re on a desktop, use your arrow keys to navigate.

If you’re on mobile, swipe in the direction of the in-game arrows to navigate.

A few thoughts about art jewellery. Just move right to read them. 

Made with Bitsy (and Pixsy and Borksy) for The Bitsy Essay Jam organized by Coleo_kin
